DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study randomize , double-blind parallel group comparison two iodinated contrast agent use percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) . All patient enrol must eGFR great equal 30 mL/min less equal 59 mL/min . Statistical summary present analyze various lab test result two group .
DOC.brief_title: Kidney Damage Patients With Moderate Fall eGFR
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age provide informed consent Scheduled undergo percutaneous coronary intervention Documented predose Estimated glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) great equal 30 mL/min/1.73 square less equal 59 mL/min/1.73 square Pregnant lactate female Severe congestive heart failure History hyperthyroidism ; Unstable renal function Emergency PCI History hypersensitivity iodinate contrast agent Receiving diuretic prevent acute renal injury
